formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Decimal networking (most common) 1 Mbps = 1000 kbps Mbps = kbps ÷ 1000 kbps = Mbps × 1000

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Binary style 1 Mbps = 1024 kbps Mbps = kbps ÷ 1024 kbps = Mbps × 1024
